text: Niramon Ounprom (, ; nicknamed Koi; , born 26 January 1985) is a Thai army officer, member of the Thai royal court, and a former Thai nurse.For sources on her training and career, including positions at court, see sections following. The title subject is listed under this Anglicised Thai name in the English language portion of the program of conference proceedings, in 2007. See Ounprom, Niramon (5 December 2007), op. cit. Sineenat was a long-time mistress of Crown Prince Vajiralongkorn of Thailand. She was given several military ranks and positions. After Prince Vajiralongkorn became King Rama X, he made her as his Royal Noble Consort, giving her the noble title of Chao Khun Phra. She is the first woman to hold the title of a royal concubine of the King of Thailand in almost a century. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Thai military people Category:Thai royalty
title: Sineenat
